page.title: 16THE VILLAGE SPORTS
page.content: {Every year}the{Sedgwick Village {Sports Committee}organises a {children's afternoon of sport}at {Crosscrake Primary School.}It begins with a{Fancy Dress Competition.}After this, there are the{sprints - first for{5,6 and 7}year olds, then for{8,9 {and 10}year olds, then for the{11-12 year olds and finally for the{13}year olds and over. There are{egg and {spoon,}three-legged,{wheelbarrow}and {sack}races. There is also a{slow bike {race.}Finally there are{long distance {races.}The{Junior}children run{four {laps of the school field,}whilst the {Seniors}cover{eight laps.}The{first {Senior boy}and{girl}both receive a {cup.
